website_summaries.verdict: With a heating element built in the lid, you'll always have a warm wipe within reach.
pros: Holds up to 100 standard-sized baby wipes
Flip-top lid gives easy access to wipes
Soft night light with 10-minute auto shutoff
Measures 7.25 inches wide by 5 inches deep by 10 inches long
Can use with cloth diaper wipes, too
Clear view section lets you see when it's nearly time to refill
cons: Heating unit warms from the top, so when when you are running low, these may not be warm
If your wipes are getting dry, add 1/4 cup of water to the unit

customer_reviews.title: Not warm—wipes still cold
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well. The wipes simply don’t get warm enough. Great concept, but better to go with a different wipe warmer. I think the problem might be that they are warmed from the top lid, rather than the whole unit. The description seems to suggest this prevents browning of the wipes. But I would rather browned warm wipes than white cold ones. If I wanted white cold ones, I wouldn’t have bought a warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Holden's Person

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worthless
customer_reviews.text: The amount of time I've spent trying to pull out a single wipe and not an entire bundle of them is reason enough alone to throw this thing away. Not to mention by the time I've got a wipe out of it none of them are warm anymore. The wipe dispenser mouth was not designed to be tight enough to pull apart the wipes so you have to do it yourself. When you have one hand on your baby you will realize how ridiculous of a requirement that is. It's especially fun when it takes you so long to pull the wipes out of the top that your baby starts peeing all over the changing table because you weren't looking.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J. King

customer_reviews.title: Terribly Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: Despite the high ratings, I am completely frustrated with this product. The wet wipes are constantly getting stuck in the bottom of the dispenser, forcing me to manually open the top and reach in to put the wipes through the opening. Additionally the dispenser is allowing the wipes to clump together and come out in two's. I'll be returning once I find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: You don't think you need one, but you do!
customer_reviews.text: With my 1st pregnancy I didn't think I would need one but it's definitely a must. It makes diaper changing comfortable for the baby. The munchkin warmer is a bit bigger then I assumed it would be, so takes a bit of room on my night stand but over all I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: DaisyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I was super excited to have a wipe warmer for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to have a wipe warmer for my baby. Now that baby is Home, I finally got to try it. He is only a week old and I'm done with this warmer. All my wipes turned a brown color and smell. Afraid to use it now as he was in nicu and i feel like this thing is growing bacteria or something.
customer_reviews.author: Aislyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The Munchkin keeps baby wipes at a perfect temperature, especially nice for cold months when a cold wipe can be a bit of a shock. It's easy to flip the lid up and grab a wipe when you're trying to be time-efficient with clean ups. It's a much better warmer than other Munchkin wipe warmers that have a water dispenser in front. This one really keeps the wipes warm-- and moist! Now I have 2 for different clean-up areas. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: muushuu10

customer_reviews.title: Nice device but not mandatory
customer_reviews.text: This is a great device to have for warming your baby wipes. Let's face it, it's more of an added convenience as opposed to being a mandatory item unless you're from Canada! What I observed thus far is that it gets pretty hot. It can dry out your wipes in no time. The night light is for item location in the dark only. It will not light up a room sufficiently to see in the dark. I would say for the price, why not? If you're on the fence with this one, you won't be missing out on anything except that remark I made about Canada above.
customer_reviews.author: Island Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good for cloth wipes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for cloth wipes. The wipes are 7.5" squares and fit perfectly. You could probably go a little bigger and still have room. The wipes are double layer flannel and I can fit about 20. If you are using cloth wipes, I recommend wetting the wipes first. When I put them in dry and added water, they weren't wet when they came out. With cloth wipes, the top 1-2 are nice and warm, but the lower ones are a little cooler. The cooler ones are still warmer than room temperature, and my two year old doesn't seem to mind. And, I tend to use only 1-2 wipes at a time anyway, so it's not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Fritzler

customer_reviews.title: Spoil your newborn a little!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my second baby and also used it for my 3rd. I got it after someone recommended it. It is lovely, especially in the newborn stage when they are so sensitive to cold wipes and would cry a lot in the middle of the night with them. Our 3rd cried in the hospital with the cold diaper changes but then stopped once we wiped her tush with these warm wipes. I never had to put water in, it doesn’t dry them out. However I disconnect it in the morning and then reconnect at night. The wire has a disconnect part that is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Orange County

customer_reviews.title: NO Good!
customer_reviews.text: While this keeps wipes warm, you can't lift the wipes out one handed. The top of the warmer where it should hold wipes one at a time will get one wipe through. When you lift with one hand, while trying to keep your little one's bum lifted, the entire warmer lifts and you can't get that wipe out. IF you can get the wipe out, that's all you get...one. The wipes don't continue coming out of the top because the flaps aren't sturdy enough to keep them lifted. You end up having to unlock the top and reach into the entire warmer to get wipes. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Rudow

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. I have not used any other warmers but it seems pointless to spend money on this thing when the first wipe we pull out is the only one warm. The others are still cold. And nobody uses just one wipe. I will be returning this as it serves no real purpose
customer_reviews.author: Alyse

customer_reviews.title: To me it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: I can see what ppl are saying about the drying out the wipes but I don’t think it’s that bad... some ppl think it’s a waste to have warm wipes and they didn’t have this back in the day but I’m sorry my son loves this. He doesn’t freak because it’s not cold unlike when we use the ones on the go when they aren’t warm. To me it’s worth it, but that prefence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much— bought 2
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift my for daughter and son in law. It was a great purchase— very functional for the purpose! They have one for the nursery and the downstairs den where they have a second changing area for little man. Reminder to potential buyers, add a little water. Keep close to full. And the diapers will stay warm. To the other reviewer stating the wipes will get cold quick—- well duh! So, grab when you’re ready for immediate use. I don’t want it to stay warm too long— it could harm the little one. My family highly recommend this product!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carmensita

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful nice wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: We really love this wipe warmer. Our baby boy used to scream a lot when changing his diaper due to the cold wet wipes. Now he screams a lot less and looks more happier since we got this wipe warmer for him. It is not only makes the wet cold wipes warm but it also keeps the moisture well as long as we use it on the regular basis. The wipes on the top could get dry a bit it is sitting there for a long time no use, but the problem will get solved by adding some water as it instructed. I really recommend to get this for newborn baby especially for whom living in the cold place.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen G

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had an issue with this product in my two month use. The wipes do not dry out for me, they stay pretty moisturized. The only thing i dislike is that the wipes instantly become cold once you grab one out so it defeats the purpose lol the very second it’s out I gotta clean baby’s booty for her to feel it warm. It’s still a nice warmer though. Guess it’ll work fine for someone with a changing table right next to the Warmer. Mine is a couple of feet away so I guess it’s understandable
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: not great at what it does unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: i followed the directions on the usage and poured 1/2 water on the wipes. it does keep the top wipe warm but it is not warm enough to be useful. if i take the top wipe out, it will become cold within a few seconds. i'm not sure if this is due to the type of wipe i am using (pampers baby sensitive wipes) but there is no way to control how warm the wipes will be. some reviews say this will warm the to few wipes, but i have experienced that this is definitely not the case. i would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great concept. Does not deliver.
customer_reviews.text: Genius was my first thought. Keeping my baby warm during the night changing diaper was something I was looking forward to. As great as the concept might be, it just doesn't work. I really wanted to like it, but after wasting so many wipes (literally takes between 5 and 7 before getting a wet one!!), I decided to return this product. The wipes dry up so fast, you end up pulling a hand full before you get a wet one, but then it stays warm for 5 seconds. I am pretty fast at changing diapers at night (believe me!), but still gets frustrated with this product, especially considering the price. I would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Agathe

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade for our little one
customer_reviews.text: We had a lot of friends tell us that these are not necessary but it was definitely a nice upgrade for our little guy. Night time changes are not as shocking on his poor little butt because the wipes are a nice warm temperature. We have not had any issues with them drying out at all, the instructions say to add some water to it when you first fill and we haven’t had any problems. The only thing I would say is that the locking feature wiggles loose eventually so you just have to check it every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: J Lembree

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Except...
customer_reviews.text: We make our own wipes from paper towels. I have two of these warmers. I have a Lionhart too, and these are superior for our use, for lots of reasons. My kids are much happier when we have reliably warm wipes... HOWEVER, in the last month, both of the warmers we have (purchased late 2017 and used for two children constantly) have developed a really frustrating issue: the rubber/silicone liners that keep the wipes in place (and keep the heat in) have torn to beyond function. They look replaceable, but, where to get the replacement...
customer_reviews.author: Nixonz

customer_reviews.title: A little extra, but not bad for what you get at the price point
customer_reviews.text: We live in one of the coldest parts of the United States and while the warmer may be a bit *extra*, we've come to find that it's exactly what our baby needs when it's freezing or below freezing out! While we keep our house in the low 70's, for those late night changes, the warmer is a nice touch and we've come to find that our baby doesn't fuss or wake up nearly as often as when he's being wiped with stone cold wipes. That said, the box itself is quite sturdy, easy to fill, and we find the light to also be helpful for those late night changes.
customer_reviews.author: CQ

customer_reviews.title: Great registry gift
customer_reviews.text: Nice for nighttime changing when baby makes a accident but you want to be able to out him back down easily. The light on the front makes it easy to see where it is. The lock feature keeps the lid from popping up when you pull out a wipe. The warmer itself is heavy enough so it wont move around. Like cord for easy to plugging in. I pour a little less water than what it says just because it makes the wipes too saturated for my liking. I havent had a problem with the wipes turning brown like some people have commented on. As long as you go through wipes quickly though I assume itll be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: NO BUENO!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 2 stars because if you keep it stocked it works well. I owned a Prince LionHeart also which is way better than this one. The heater is on the lid so unless you have wipes damn near the heating element it wont do any good (as others have stated). Because the heating element is in the lid the qued wipe is warmed and if not used soon will dry out. If used before drying out the first will be warm all others cold. The one I got had one latch defective which im sure it was just mine should have returned it but I was lazy no biggy with some finagling it stayed sealed tight.
customer_reviews.author: Vic D.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient wipe warmer for wintertime
customer_reviews.text: So far so good - the wipes are being warmed sufficiently. I change the baby in the crib, so I need to move the warmer into the crib for every diaper change, and the cord is easy to detach and reattach when moving warmer from place to place. I feel like I am frequently fishing inside the warmer for the next wipe, as they don’t always get pulled up by the previous wipe, but that’s not really the issue with the warmer. I am not a fan of the bright green warmer parts and would have preferred an all-white warmer for my interior.
customer_reviews.author: ANASTASIA P.

customer_reviews.title: Good Warmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little wipes warmer. It doesn’t dry out the wipes and overall keeps the wipes warm. The wipes toward the top of the warmer will be warmer than the wipes at the bottom. This is due to the heating element being in the lid of the unit. Do not expect the wipes at the bottom to be toasty warm, but they will be warmer than not having the wipes in the warmer at all. I like the little night light that clicks on and off. It is not a bright light, but it does a decent job with illuminating a little area. I have been using this warmer for 6 weeks and have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Casale

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cloth wipes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wipes warmer with the intention to use with our cloth wipes after our Prince Lionhart Warmies warmer broke. I read other reviews online and thought this would work but unfortunately it does not get the wipes warm enough. We pre-soak our cloth wipes and after sitting in the warmer for less than 24 hours they started to have a musty smell because they weren’t being kept warm. I’ll be returning this and purchasing another Warmies wipes warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So you like half your wipe to be dry and cold and the other to be damp and slightly warmed?
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but don't. You have to constantly pour water into it to keep the wipes from drying out completely. Then, the first wipe is ALWAYS half dry and cold and the other half is slightly warm but not enough to matter. The 2nd wipe you use is usually a little warmer and wetter than the first but ultimately not warm enough. This product would probably be better if the warmer would get a little hotter for the super cold months and not let the top wipes get dry. Or at the very least have a temperature controller on the container. I was disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: So great that I got a 2nd!
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer has been a life saver! Seriously. We were gifted one for our baby shower. And it was such a great product that we bought a 2nd one. (1 in the nursery and 1 in our bedroom where she sleeps!) So many people told me wipe warmers were a waste of money. But my baby hated diaper changes, unless we used wipes from the warmer. I'm talking full on meltdowns because she doesn't like cold wipe on her bum, and who could blame her?! So this was a game changer. I will say it isn't *super* durable though. Because one decided to jump off the table and break the little lid off. Thankfully ductape exists and saved it!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: No functionality
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this thing cause it’s functionality could be super helpful but I should’ve believed the reviews, it only warms the top wipe and even then it barely warms it unless the wipes are all the way pushed against the heating mechanism — which is super weak. I’ll have to try another one cause she would prefer wipes to be warm. This thing has no functionality, it’s just cute to look at but every time I look at it I’m just bummed it doesn’t serve the purpose I was hoping it would. Don’t believe the reviews about people who said it worked, doesn’t seem legit. They probably just like how cute the light is but doesn’t warm anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ebeezy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd be the mom who bought a wipe warmer but diaper changes turned into a scream-fest because the wipes were cold. So I bought this and I like it. It warms the wipes quickly and I like the light on it so I can see when it needs to be refilled. The only drawback is that it doesn't continually feed the wipes through the slot. It's a pretty big gap and kind of loose so we always have to really dig in there to pull wipes out unless it was just filled. That said, it's main purpose is to warm the wipes, which it does well. I do wish it came in more colors though.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Game changer.
customer_reviews.text: We read a bunch of reviews before settling on this wipe warmer. We add a 1/4 cup of water so are wipes dont dry out. We havent had any problems. We also air it out twice a week just so we dont have to worry about any mold issues. My son absolutely loves this wipe warmer! It's perfect for when he has poopy diapers, and middle of the night changes. It only makes the top wipes warm, so some may be a little cool. Make sure you close the top lid or you will dry out the wipes inside.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Williford

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer
customer_reviews.text: My son would jump when I cleaned him with a cold wipe. Even holding it in my hand for a minute wasn’t enough. I got tired of being screamed at by my kid and figured getting yelled at by my wife was easier, so I got this warmer. Sure enough, my sanity was questioned...until she used it and saw how much happier it made our boy. She still thinks I make dumb purchases, but this one is less dumb.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Good product and everything’s working well 2 months in.
customer_reviews.text: It’s been 2 months since purchase and everything is in order nothing broken and I’m not careful with it (I have ruff manners). You definitely need to add the 1/2 cup of water as stated in the directions. I recommend if you don’t use wipes regularly pack only half full and make sure there’s always a bit of water. Also like the quick disconnect option in the wall plug, the wipe warmer isn’t near her changing table.
customer_reviews.author: First Time Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Listen Up First Time Grandmas...
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says it is. It does what it says it does. It makes it a nicer deal for your new joy's fanny. THAT SAID... it costs a lot more than what you may want to pay. I get it. You can find people getting rid of them on other "markets" for $10 or a bit more. All told it is a super nice thing to have. Not something you HAVE to have... but nice on that precious new fanny! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jsmith

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: The lid is the only part that actually warms so only the first two wipes are even warm. Definitely make sure you add water like it recommends or they dry out due to the heat evaporating the moisture. I understand it doesn’t get super warm for safety reasons but by the time I pull the wipe and Put it to my baby’s skin it it is cold already so kinda disappointing. Granted it keeps the wipes from being ice cold so helpful in that department.
customer_reviews.author: catreenajean

customer_reviews.title: Great if you use dry wipes like me
customer_reviews.text: Great if you use dry wipes like me. I put them in this warmer and add about 2 cups of water. The top wipe is always warm. Even when there's only a few left on the bottom.They do tend to dry out over time. Some drawbacks that were not a deal breaker for me: 1. The opening on top is hard to use if you use dry wipes that are folded in several layers. 2. It only warms up a couple of the wipes I use: 3. Can dry out the wipes if left in there for a long time. You can just add some water though to get them moist again.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: It could be warmer but it's still worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is decent, nothing to write home about, BUT I'm glad I have it versus cold wipes, my baby notices the difference. It doesn't get as warm as I would like. It's best & warmest when it's full & after I've poured the cup of very warm water in & let it heat up good for a little while. I wish the heating mechanism wasn't only at the top, but it's still a help. This is my 2nd one. It's still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: infrared

customer_reviews.title: Should have got this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Didn’t put a wipe warmer on my registry because I didn’t think it was necessary. Well, now that it’s a little cooler in the house at night and early in the morning it changed my opinion. First of all I feel awful when my daughter jumps from a cold wipe but also it’s so hard to get her back to sleep after such a shock. I’ve had this wipe warmer for one day and I’m already so pleased with it. It was easy to set up and the warm wipes are so soothing.
customer_reviews.author: Crazycutehead

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!! my baby stopped crying during diaper changes.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! my baby stopped crying during diaper changes unless she's hungry then it doesn't matter how warm the wipe is :) Not sure why people complain about the wipes getting cold when taken out, they're wet wipes that's mildly warmed so you don't burn your child, If you take a wipe out and don't use it immediately it'll get cold.. That's simple thermodynamics. Product is great and definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good at warming and keeping warm the wipes for your baby if he/she is sensitive to coolness on the bottom. My granddaughter doesn't like anything cool to touch her. Unfortunately, the warmer is difficult to use with wipes like Huggies. The way the wipes are packaged prevents them from being pulled productively for use. Huggies packaging and others like it ... you will spend a lot of time digging for the wipes. Not a big deal for many. Not a deal breaker but it is a bit of a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Samiya

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Keeps wipes warm an moist. Love the night light. Just be sure to close completely after each pull to avoid them drying out. Easy fix..just open it up and a little water onto the wipes and close to bring back the moisture. Even has locking tabs on each side to secure top. (Side note/hack...try using a red light bulb at night in your bedroom lamp.. Allows you to see in the middle of the night without keeping the baby awake or blinding yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Warm wipes, working well
customer_reviews.text: This wipes warmer is working well. I do add 1/2 cup water when I put a new stack of wipes in. When I finish a diaper change, I make sure the next wipe is pulled up to the lid so it will be warm. (Warmer heats from top down.) Wipes are just warm enough; definitely not too warm. I've used the night light feature a few times so far and it's been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not too effective.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was just my inexperience with wipe warmers, but due to the design, you needed to keep it FULL. Wipes constantly tore. We tried three brands of wipes, and they all tore VERY easily. Cute, and has a convenient light that turns off after a few minutes. (Long enough to change a diaper at night.) Could be better designed. Temp of the top wipe (when full) was good. Not too hot, but then again, it was getting it to be constantly full without drying the top wipe out.
customer_reviews.author: XxGold-EyesxX

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buying a wipe warmer in generally as I didnt feel it was one of those things I needed but I was wrong. My baby HATES getting his diaper changed, however once I broke down and finally got one of these hes a little but more calm, he cries less and sometimes not even at all. Not too warm, and doesn't dry out the wipe either.
customer_reviews.author: ELM8194

customer_reviews.title: Used for Cloth wipes-
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. We use cloth wipes that we wet with water and put inside to stay warm. I was hoping this would save us fork having to wait for our hot water to Turn on to wipe our newborn. It works okay but Wasn’t worth the money. Only the top few wipes stay warm. it gets the job done and my newborn screams less when they are warm. In the future I would just go without. Cloth wipes do not come through the top FYI. I just open the whole container each time, which I was expecting to do.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: I’ve bought better.
customer_reviews.text: The lid stays open if u don’t shut it. And the lock feature is useless. I’ve had other warmers that u don’t need pads and don’t need to add water that work better than this. It does warm the wipes. So it does what it’s suppose to. This was a secondary purchase for our room for changing in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best warmer, best price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our first baby when middle of the night changings were waking her up. I love it! Used for 6 months before a freak lightning storm fried it. Never dried my wipes, never turned them brown. Loved that it was easy to setup each time, just add a little water to the bottom and put wipes in. Fits all standard wipes. Could pull wipes out with one hand. Warms from top so you always have a warm wipe (unless you use like 5 or more in which case baby is probably awake anyway) and the price is phenomenal! Husband replaced the fried one with a fancier more expensive one and I hate it. Miss my munchkin warmer!
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great product, baby is happy
customer_reviews.text: When my baby was born, the hospital doesn’t have the warmer for wipes, every time they use the cold wipes on her, she cries. I bought this warmer in advance, once we got home, I started to use this product. The temperature doesn’t get too hot and it keeps the moist on the wipes. Felt she is so happy when using on her!
customer_reviews.author: Doudou

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I believe that this is a must product if you have a baby or child in diapers My son used to cry when I would change his diaper in the middle of the night or even daytime ( We live in Minnesota so cold weather) and that’s when I decided to purchase this wipe warmer. What I like about it is that it gets the job done. It does warm up the wipes and now my son no longer cries during diaper change. I wish it warmed up a bit more, it seems that after a few seconds the warmth is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry
customer_reviews.text: It warms wipes very well. The first time I filled it I added a half a cup of water & the wipes always felt very wet . Next time I did not add any water & the wipes had the same amount of moisture they normally would. I’m sure it depends on the type of wipes you use if they become dry or not we use the Huggies natural wipes. Also I don’t really have a problem with wipes not coming out until we get to the very bottom which is normal with any wipe dispenser. Again I think it depends on which wipes you use.
customer_reviews.author: Lkell

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby
customer_reviews.text: I originally thought a wipe warmer was one of those ridiculous baby items.. during the 1st week of bringing my baby home, nightime diaper changes quickly broke out in screams and cries as soon as the cold wipes hit my babys bum. After purchasing this warmer, diaper changes have been a lot smoother.. my baby no longer screams and the wipes are nice and warm everytime. As long as you pour a little water over each package of wipes you add - they are always moist and never dry out. I no longer consider a wipe warmer an impulse purchase but instead a neccesity in keeping my baby happy
customer_reviews.author: BauerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not a necessity, but a nicety
customer_reviews.text: We like this wipe warmer and just bought our second one...first one the lid bit the dust when our 2 year old threw it off the changing table. Besides the warm wipes being more comfortable, the warm wipes clean better than cold wipes l, especially if you add a little water to the warmer. The little night light is great and helps avoid turning on the overhead light during nighttime changes . The wipes sometimes get dried out, but this can be fixed by adding a little water. Bottom line: is this wipe warmer absolutely necessary? No. But it's nice to have
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy. Finally decided to purchase a wipe warmer with our third baby's birth and despite the fact that we live in Hawaii, I use it daily and my baby loves not having a cold wipe touching her bum in the middle of the night. Love the built-in nightlight too. Just enough to see for a diaper change, although it's not enough to see everything when changing a poopy diaper. I would still recommend this to anyone. It's big enough to fit a whole pack of Kirkland wipes which is perfect. Edited to add: our baby is now 2 yrs old and we still use this wipe warmer daily. It works perfectly still.
customer_reviews.author: Lera B

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t warm.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely doesn’t warm much of anything. They’re still cold when I pull them out. Also my box came clearly already opened. Didn’t come in an amazon box, it came in the product box. I seems I’ve hoten someone else’s return, probably because it didn’t warm for them either. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Reed-Ski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high quality warmer
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use for our cloth wipes. It’s amazingly easy to use, keeps the wipes at the perfect temperature & is super easy to clean. Has a really amazing “night light” feature that lights up the warmer itself during the night, which makes it easier to see what you’re doing. Also has a double side lock feature that’s so nice because our curious 18mo daughter can’t open the warmer or dump the wipes out! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Only the top wipe that is pulled threw to grab gets warm. Once it's pulled out for use it is cool by the time it gets to baby hiney. I bought this to help with cold wipes for our NB during the winter time, but turned out to be the biggest waste of money. This is certainly the #1 useless baby item I've bought and this was baby #2. So, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany D Staples

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work.
customer_reviews.text: The lock doesn’t work so well. It’s hard to get the wipes out if they fall through the rubber slot. The rubber slot never completely seals after about a week of use, it gets wore out. Also, as soon as you take the wipe out, you feel it get cold IMMEDIATELY! Literally, you remove the wipe and it’s cold before it reaches the baby’s skin. Within a second. Doesn’t make sense. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Mommy must have
customer_reviews.text: Updated : after going through the pandemic crisis I learned how to preserve as much as possible . So what I did to my wipes was add about a cup full of warm water inside the wipe warmer every week and it keeps the wipes moist and now I am very pleased with how the wipes aren’t dried out and come out a lot warmer now that they are more wet . Love this product now .
customer_reviews.author: Cheves Family

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: This warmer does work. The lid is where the heat feature is. With that being said, you can imagine what happens when it's no longer full (the wipes don't stay as warm). It doesn't make the wipes hot but it keeps them warm. Mu baby likes the warm wipes, which works wonders at night when I am trying to change him without waking him. I gave it 4 stars because one of my lock switches always switches unlocked by itself & it doesn't keep the wipes as warm when it's not full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes wipes a little more bearable for baby
customer_reviews.text: The wipes do not get super warm but warm enough to not make the baby jolt from the freezing cold wipes without this warmer. If you are putting in a fresh bag of wipes, I would not recommend pouring the water in immediately like the directions say. I did that and the wipes ended up being super soggy for the first few times. I would test it first and then add the water if more moisture is needed. This is great for the wipes that come out continuously. We have to leave the latch unlocked and open the box to retrieve our wipes.
customer_reviews.author: dpowell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was nice, for the first day. It warmed up the wipes nicely until the next day when it began to dry out the top wipes. So I added water as instructed and come the following night it no longer warmed my wipes. You were only supposed to add a half a cup of water, which I did, and even still the warmth stopped working. It makes sense considering the whole warmer doesn’t get warm, just the top so it doesn’t touch the rest of the wipes. Totally disappointed, make sure you read the bad reviews because they tell the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Cano

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Wipe Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I like how you add water because the wipes are nice and moist and the second and further wipes are nice and warm. The first wipe never is very warm though because it sits on top behind the latch and I find I have to pull a large amount of the next wipe out of the slot in order to get a wipe out. Still warmer than not having this product at all though. I find it works better with some wipe brands and not so great with others. It has enough space to hold wipes from large wipe bags.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This unit does just as we had hoped and warms up the wipes for our newborn's bottom. The light that lights up when it's on is nice and helps find the wipes in a darker room. This unit keeps the wipes moist and the only small complaint I have and reason for 4 stars is that when the wipes get down in count it doesn't seem to warm them nearly as good as when it is full.
customer_reviews.author: The Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Dries Out Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Just as mentioned - this really dries out wipes. It is great to keep the wipes warm, but I had to constantly add water. The wipes then did not feel right.
customer_reviews.author: Cait

customer_reviews.title: Wipes are warm all the way through the stack and they stay moist when used properly.
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer works fantastically. We use it everyday and leave it warming all day. You do have to make sure that you have the top fully sealed and it is challenging to seal it with a wipe extended. The other functional problem is that when the wipes get low they tend to fall down and it is hard to get them out through the hole. Those are typical problems though. The glowing light makes it easy to use when it is dark. It stays moist as long as the lid is closed. Wipes are warm all the way through, not just the top one.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Reusable wipes user
customer_reviews.text: So i bought this for my reusable wipes and honestly it works great. The locking feature was an added bonus i hadint noticed when i originally purchased but im very greatful for especially with 2 curious kids under 2. I didnt give it 5 stars inly because i make my own solution to add to the wipes and it tends to leak because of that. If you are using it for regulr wipes then it should be no problem
customer_reviews.author: miriam salazar

customer_reviews.title: Useless product
customer_reviews.text: The wipe warmer was fairly useless. The wipes are warm and toasty for about half a second. By the time you grab one and separate it from the next wipe, it's cold – long before it reaches your baby's little behind! Plus, the bottom wipes get all crispy and the top ones dry out really fast
customer_reviews.author: Paula Marques

customer_reviews.title: Warmest Wipes Wishes
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly great for keeping the wipes a steady temperature. The glow feature is very soft 🙂 and doesn't cause my little one to become alert because of it's light. I left them in the package as you can see from the photo. Only thing I noticed was condensation on the lid however, that leads me to believe they'll stay wet. I have not turned the warmer off since plugging into the wall. I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jahri

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I hated this wipe warmer. Do not buy it. It dried out every set of wipes I put in it and I tried 3 brands of wipes. It also has come unlocked on the sides on multiple occasions now that I use it as just a regular wipes dispenser and don’t use the warming feature. I would never recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It warms from the top and not the bottom. The lid does not lock.
customer_reviews.text: I would prefer the lock feature to be tighter but as long as the lid is down it does a great job keeping the wipes perfectly warm for my LO. The light feature is a nice touch too as well as not needing a pad at the bottom like some sides. It's a great price and works very well. I had the Lioness brand (it something of the sort) before this and the latch to pop the lid up broke. This model does not have that feature and therefore no worry if that happening. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wright

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer works fairly well overall. It moderately warms the wipes, but I have found the heating to be erratic. I realize the heating element is in the lid and the warmth of the wipes depends on how close they are to the lid of the box. However, the heat coming from the lid of the box fluctuates, and is warmer or less warm at times for no apparent reason. Still, it works to take the edge off of cold wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rich U

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work well for me :/
customer_reviews.text: My device leaked water. I returned everything and never ordered anything in replacement. I did however liked the locks on the box, though it was annoying to yank out the wet cloth if it separated from the stack. All in all after I returned the device I did not bother to look for something different, so I can’t be much if help here.
customer_reviews.author: Vladlena Malikova

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep wipe warm long enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my baby would cry every time I changed her because of what I assumed was a cold wipe. I expected this to make the wipe very warm but it only makes it lukewarm and the heat lasts only seconds on the wipe. From the time I pull the wipe and get it to my little ones hiney, it’s already cold. I was not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Woke up to the smell of smoke
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this item. LO dislikes cold wipes in the middle of the night and this seemed like the perfect solution. Woke up one night to the smell of something burning, followed the odor to this wipe warmer and a lot of dry and browned wipes. Unplugged it immediately and have not used it since.
customer_reviews.author: Goonies

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it I need it to
customer_reviews.text: I would describe the temperature as perfect. Excellent for avoiding temperature shocks on diaper changes. The heat feature is in the top section so the warmth of the wipes begins to die of after 4-5 wipes, but not frequently do I use that many in a single diaper change. I've had the lid come unlocked a couple times, but that may be due to not properly securing it.
customer_reviews.author: Joash Wall

customer_reviews.title: Baby enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Our new born didn't like the normal cold wipes. We got this and she no longer goes crazy when we wipe her. Like other reviews, the warmer is at the top so the top wipes are the warmest. I only wish I can move this warmer around easily and plugging it back in (I have to move some things around to unplug this warmer).
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Wipes turn cold as soon as they’re out
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want a wipe warmer at the beginning, however my sister insisted I get one. With that being said, I bought this wipe warmer. To my disappointment, it was a waste of money. As soon as I take out a wipe, yes it is warm, then go to wipe my baby’s bottom, it was already cold. I already threw the box away, therefore I am unable to return this. My husband was also upset on how quickly the wipe went from warm to cold in a second. Don’t waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. Don’t waste your money. Worked well at first, but crapped out within just a few weeks. Only keeps certain types of wipes moist also, which is weird. Usually dries out the wipes regardless after a few days. The seal also broke where the wipes come out, rendering it useless basically. Just returned it today; would’ve returned sooner, but had two postpartum infections as a result of a long labor and was in the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve listened to other reviewers but no, I gotta try it myself and I returned it 3 days later. We live in a mountain town and fall/winter here gets super cold. I bought this for my newborn thinking that she will like not having a cold wipe touch her bottom. Well, it only heats up the top sheet and right after I took it out of there, it gets cold in 2 seconds. If I needed more than 1 sheet then I’m out of luck too. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Xutzen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job. Consistent performance to date.
customer_reviews.text: I have an older unit (approximately 5 years) which I have used intermittently as needed. Purchased this one for another area of the house. Both do the job, although wipes do dry out a bit over time. A little distilled water into the packet of wipes to re-hydrate, and you're good to go again. Otherwise, continuous warming will dry out the wipes and may discolor them. Outside case of units stays cool to the touch. Consistent performance to date.
customer_reviews.author: CIH

customer_reviews.title: Love! My first baby is 9 weeks and just ...
customer_reviews.text: Love! My first baby is 9 weeks and just ordered this. I didn't register for a wipe warmer because I didn't think it was a necessity, but after mistakenly buying a huge refill box of wipes I thought I would just buy something to put them in! It works great and so nice for my son especially with the winter coming, brrr. Not a must have for baby items in my opinion, but certainly a nice treat for your baby. Have not experience drying out or cold wipes yet as others have mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great overall warmer! I use mine with out the packaging on the wipes. Make sure to lock the lid from the side or it will dry out your wipes lol. I should of read the directions! 😂 The warmth to the wipes is perfect! Should of bought two for my up stairs!
customer_reviews.author: Charles &.

customer_reviews.title: The REALEST of Real Reviews: Excellent Product and Even Better Price, Baby Approved
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wipe warmer for my infant nephew. He absolutely hated to get his diaper changed and would cry because his wipes were so cold. I told his mother about this wipe warmer and that I was sending it to them. As soon as they received the wipe warmer they began to use it and my infant nephew no longer cried when he had to have his diaper changed. That alone is reason enough to purchase this item. It saves baby from crying and stress, it works, and the price simply can’t be beat. This will forever be my go-to baby shower gift for all new mothers.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Made the wipes smelly!
customer_reviews.text: So it does keep the wipes warm but puts a bad stink in them 😷 giving it a chemical like scent and I use all natural honest brand wipes so I stopped using this product. It's now just collecting dust. I also don't like that there is a light that always stays on for our baby's blackout room for the night.
customer_reviews.author: The Shahs

customer_reviews.title: cool concept, not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to write this review for a year. I like that the wipes are warm... but... this unit is not very good. I received it with the right lock broken and I didn't think it was a big deal until every time I pulled up on a wipe the left lock would come undone and the whole top would open. This is annoying because 1. it lets all the heat out and 2. I have to try and hold baby with one arm while closing and locking the lid with the other so I can get a wipe out. It just isn't very great quality.
customer_reviews.author: natalie s.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I initially didn't feel this was necessary, so my wife convinced to try it and it has made diaper changing much better for my little one. If your baby doesn't like being changed to began with, a cold wipe can send them over the edge. The warm wipes helped calm our baby down and now he doesn't mind changing at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I used it during winter to protect ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I used it during winter to protect you baby's bum from being shocked during changing time in winter or in the middle of the night. Be sure not to put too much baby wipes at the time. I only put around 1.5 inch stacks of wipes and the pour warm water on the wipes so it will stay moist and easy cleaning for your baby when the wipes are super moist.
customer_reviews.author: AnneTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good warmer. Bad night light.
customer_reviews.text: The wipe warmer does a good job warming the Honest wet wipes that we put in it. We do not feel the need to add water to the warmer as some have suggested to help keep the wipes moist. The night light feature is laughable... it emits little to no light... nothing that we find to be helpful during night time diaper changes.
customer_reviews.author: prashant kumar

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Ugh I dont know why I bought this for the 2nd child in a row of my three because it SUCKS! After a very short time period (like not even a month) the part you pull the wipes through gets stretched out and warped making it annoying and hard to pull just one wipe out at a time. Therefore, you are either stuck trying to shove your hand in there or unlocking the sides each time to get whatever wipes you need. The warping and stretching also contributes to air getting in there easily making them dry out fast.
customer_reviews.author: PaulyJo

customer_reviews.title: Not all wipes are warm only the top part stays warm.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to my new born twins screaming every time with a cold wipe. I plug in and not all the wipes get warm only the top. So I try to keep it full at all times. I did notice when wipes were just about have way that as soon as I took them out the wipes was getting cold so fast. The warmer part is only at the top of the warmer.
customer_reviews.author: yesenia

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Dries them out. But it says that on the pamphlet. There's no problem if you unplug the warmer during the day or however you wanna do it -just so the warmer isn't on 24/7. Also if you use wipes ONLY from the warmer it shouldn't be a problem either---because you'll likely go through them before they dry out. But if you're like me and use wipes here and there they'll more-likely dry out. Also--not super warm or anything. And usually just the first wipe is warm. And when there's any less than full capacity they hardly get warm at all. All in all, it gets a "meh" from me
customer_reviews.author: Chantal I

customer_reviews.title: Happy Mother
customer_reviews.text: Using this to warm damp cloth washcloths for my elderly mother to use who always has cold hands. We fitted it with an inline on/off switch, which only makes sense and should be part of the unit - but otherwise happy with the design. I fitted the inside with a disposable aluminum pan (had to bend to fit) for ease of cleaning AND to raise the wash cloth higher to the warming lid. Mother is VERY pleased with the warmth.
customer_reviews.author: adw

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s earth & comfort
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get warm as advertised. Sometimes my newborn screams from the lack of earth when I’m cleaning him between diaper changes. I was a little disappointed because it’s still fall. They will prove to be even colder as the temps changes colder.
customer_reviews.author: “G-Eye Joe”

customer_reviews.title: Best for Baby
customer_reviews.text: I have often seen these wipe warmers on peoples lists of "Top 10 Baby Items I Regret Buying". I don't get it. I think this wipe warmer is AMAZING. Who wants to wake up in the middle of the night and have a freezing cold, wet tissue wiped against their lovely warm skin? Not me and DEFINITELY not a newborn baby. My baby is now 4 months old and I still love it. I wish there were a portable version. You do need to add a half cup of hot water to the wipes each time you fill it but that's all it needs. Definitely buy this.
customer_reviews.author: OY-YO BABY

customer_reviews.title: Not as described...
customer_reviews.text: Got this wipes warmer since it was a good warehouse deal labeled as being "acceptable" but it just looked dirty and there was even a hair on it when I pulled it out! I thought it was at least be clean when I got it....no thank you, not using this on my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Team MOM

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for winter babies
customer_reviews.text: I had a December baby so of course it was really cold . Our house doesn’t have central a/c so we had to use space heaters which somewhat did the job. I was not about to use a cold wipe on my newborn ! This helped a lot ! It does dry out some wipes like I noticed it more on huggies but huggies wipes seem drying to me. All I did was add a little water on top and all good! Pampers wipes are my preferred wipes I feel like they’re more moist and they don’t dry out with the wipe warmer!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica garcia

customer_reviews.title: Barely warms
customer_reviews.text: It barely does the job. I know the wipes aren’t suppose to be super hot but it’s barely warm. As soon as I take one out and the air hits it it’s a cold wipe. The warmer has to be warmer.
customer_reviews.author: muffin

customer_reviews.title: A great product for any baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wipe warmer. It makes changing so much more pleasant for the baby versus being shocked by a cold wipe. Hey, just because kids dealt with cold wipes in the past, why should we put our babies through that agony?! I gave a 4 out of a 5 due to this being my second one. The first had electrical issues and needed to be returned. I also would love this more if it had a timer that could set the start and end time! Tip to those who find that it dries wipes out: When I am gone for long periods of time (work, etc), I unplug the unit. I have not had issues with wipes drying out.
customer_reviews.author: TM77

customer_reviews.title: Buy some form of wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: Lots of online sources said a wipe warmer was “unnecessary” for a baby, but I disagree - If you can afford one, do it! It makes such a difference for changing time, between an upset baby and a content one. We’ve had problems with the wipes not continuing to feed through the top, especially when they get low, but even with this inconvenience it’s so worth it to have warm wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Clasen

customer_reviews.title: Great product, especially for price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Doesn’t heat the wipes all the way through but it doesn’t really matter as you only use a few on the top anyways. Keeps them moist, have not had issues with them drying out. I love that the button on the front is a little night light. Definitely a must have if you are looking to make diaper changing more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Brown

customer_reviews.title: Keeps wipes wet and keeps them warm
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. It doesn’t dry out the sipes at all, I never even add water. The only downside is the lock latches slide open randomly so once or twice a day it opens while pulling a wipe out. That’s not a big deal though
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

product_meta.title: Munchkin Warm Glow Wipe Warmer
product_meta.description:
Color:1 PackDo ice cold wipes trigger unhappy cries during diaper changes? The Warm Glow Wipe Warmer by Munchkin will soothe baby's bottom and warm mom's heart. Help make diaper changing more enjoyable for your little one with the comfort of a warm wipe. This convenient wipe warming system stores up to 100 standard baby wipes and dispenses them conveniently from a flip top lid. Its low voltage, top down warming system ensures a warm wipe every time without the risk of browning, drying, or discoloration. It also features a soft glow night light that helps with nighttime changes and automatically shuts off after 10 minutes of use. A built in window allows you to keep tabs on your wipes supply without opening the unit, while the tightly sealing system keeps wipes moist over time. • The power adapter is compatible with and should be plugged into a standard household 110 120 volt AC outlet only. Do not plug into a 220 volt or alternative voltage AC outlet. Only use with a Class 2 adapter.

BRAND STORY
By Munchkin
feature_bullets: Low voltage, energy efficient wipe warmer with soft night light
Flip top lid allows easy access to wipes. Night light features 10 minute auto shut off
Holds up to 100 standard sized baby wipes (wipes not included)
Dimensions: 7.25 inches x 5 inches x 10 inches. Latex free
When adding new wipes to the warm glow wipe warmer, pour up to half cup of water over the top of the wipes. To preserve wipes and energy, unplug unit during prolonged periods of non use

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars9,907 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
